metadata.description: Across the centuries, and in all their incarnations, the vampiric brothers Radu and Vlad continue their bloody feud. But how long can the immortals remain completely immune to the humanity of their hosts before their emotions and feelings start to merge? Now the brothers feel their will and that of the humans they inhabit become combined, and their fate, which they once felt so certain they controlled, is changed forever.  The epic conclusion to this fantasy saga will see the brothers face a new and unexpected battle – a battle for their minds.
metadata.name: The Chronicles of Legion
